text: The Talbot Shrewsbury Book (London, British Library Royal 15 E vi ) is a very large manuscript with many illustrations. ==Other websites== A full photographic reproduction of Royal 15 E. vi is available on the British Library Digitised Manuscripts website. For further information about authors, bibliography and lists of surviving manuscripts see ARLIMA: Archives de littérature du Moyen Âge. Category:Manuscripts
title: Talbot Shrewsbury Book
